modShortDescription: Thanks to Chiko for sharing a video on the game Scum, Guppycur was given the idea to add a firework block. This 7 Days to Die mod adds a firework block.
modDescription:
This 7 Days to Die mod adds a firework block. Nothing fancy.

Thanks to Chiko for sharing a video on the game Scum, Guppycur was given the idea to add a firework block. Does it serve a real practical purpose, some hot onions may ask? He dunno.

He added some XML to make the heat level rise, but no clue if it works since F3 no longer shows chunk heat.

[Download](https://gitlab.com/guppycur/guppymods/-/archive/master/guppymods-master.zip?path=Guppycur%27s_Fireworks)

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/9144-guppycurs-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Guppycur](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/guppycur/), Chiko
